name: Kirby: Planet Robobot™
description:
Planet Popstar is being invaded by the Haltmann Works Company and its robotic army, and only Kirby can put a stop to it in Kirby: Planet Robobot. Take the fight to the evil corporation using Kirby's trademark Copy Abilities plus all-new abilities, and turn their own technology against them by taking control of the powerful Robobot Armour! Take a break from the main adventure, you can also get stuck into some fun minigames: partner with pals to take on bosses in Team Kirby Clash, or go for a high score in Kirby 3D Rumble!

Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for
compatible amiibo™ and the latest
information. To use amiibo on
Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and
Nintendo 2DS systems a
Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is
required.
